AStr.Run: The standard alphabetic representation of Portuguese.

MatchedPairs24.Uni: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?> <MatchedPairs> <pair open="(" close=")" permitParaSpanning="false" /> <pair open="[" close="]" permitParaSpanning="false" /> </MatchedPairs>

PunctuationPatterns24.Uni: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?> <PunctuationPatterns> <pattern value="’ " context="WordFinal" valid="true" /> <pattern value=" ‘" context="WordInitial" valid="true" /> <pattern value=" “" context="WordInitial" valid="true" /> <pattern value="” " context="WordFinal" valid="true" /> <pattern value=".” " context="WordFinal" valid="true" /> <pattern value="? " context="WordFinal" valid="true" /> <pattern value="), " context="WordFinal" valid="true" /> <pattern value="-" context="WordMedial" valid="true" /> <pattern value=": " context="WordFinal" valid="true" /> <pattern value=", " context="WordFinal" valid="true" /> <pattern value="! " context="WordFinal" valid="true" /> <pattern value=" (" context="WordInitial" valid="true" /> <pattern value="; " context="WordFinal" valid="true" /> <pattern value=". " context="WordFinal" valid="true" /> </PunctuationPatterns>

QuotationMarks24.Uni: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?> <QuotationMarks LangUsedFrom="pt_BR" ContinuationType="RequireAll" ContinuationMark="Opening"> <Levels> <Pair Opening="“" Closing="”" /> <Pair Opening="‘" Closing="’" /> </Levels> </QuotationMarks>
